title: Waking The Zed
description: Waking The Zed explores the "true" story of zombie origins, and the first day of the zombie apocalypse. What's your theory about the rise of the dead? Pam Stone shows up for a job she hates at Future Faith Cryonics. She dislikes caring for frozen bodies, but she really hates her employer. When her mad boss starts experimenting with a new serum that she believes can revive her very cold clients, Pam may not even survive long enough to regret taking this job!
author: M.L. Katz
